intro: Kleinia gracilis, commonly known as the slender Kleinia, is a succulent plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the Aizoaceae family, which is commonly referred to as the ice plant family. The plant features fleshy, linear leaves that are typically bluish-green in color, adapted to store water in arid environments. It produces small, star-shaped flowers in shades of yellow and orange during the summer months. Kleinia gracilis is often grown as an ornamental plant due to its compact growth habit and attractive foliage.
